A very very brief history of the Web

19 Oct 2006

For the last few months, I've had a regular TV spot on Channel 31's Breakfast Show Live as the Geek of the Week (though it's actually fortnightly).

This morning, my topic was the History of the Web. I've posted the transcript online for dissection and ridicule. Enjoy!

Dan Walmsley
